Trade/Device Name(s): Cepheid Xpert MRSA NxG Control Panel
Regulation Name(s): Assayed Quality Control Material For Clinical Microbiology Assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Cepheid Xpert MRSA NxG Control Panel, an external assayed quality control panel for use with Cepheid Xpert MRSA NxG Assay on the GeneXpert Instrument System
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as external assayed positive and negative quality controls to monitor qualitative detection of Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus with Cepheid Xpert MRSA NxG Assay on the GeneXpert Instrument System
